data.title: Great atmosphere,  kinda pricey
data.text: Stopped in after a day of exploring Johnson City.  Fantastic atmosphere,  great music.  Beer was very good.  The outdoor patio was also a nice touch.  Has a very modern industrial vibe.  Will definitely be back with friends again.

data.title: Amazing place!
data.text: Yee Haw is just terrific, and well deserving of a visit. (It was a great break from the long drive from the Smokies up to Virginia.) The brewpub is wonderful, as is the outdoor seating; great to see the old Tweetsie rail station that it's in so lovingly restored. And the beers don't disappoint; the Octoberfest is as good as anything that Munich produces!

data.title: Fun night Good food
data.text:
More of a college crowd. But the tacos were very good. I had the Fish, Shrimp and the Gyro Taco. And all were good.
By the time we left around 7pm. It started getting full. Good crowd. 
I enjoyed the food and their beer wasn't bad, pretty good to be honest.

data.title: Cold Beer!
data.text: Amazing place. The beer is made on site so you know it is fresh. They have a great selection and a great atmosphere.

data.title: Loved those tacos
data.text: My family does not drink beer but we loved the awesome tacos!! Everyone must try these  gourmet amazing tacos!

data.title: Taco Haven
data.text: If you like tacos with a twist of fusion and flare you will enjoy this place.  Great atmosphere and friendly service.

data.title: Beer tour
data.text: nice patio, the beer was excellent . we are not big beer drinker but  the lady helped us to choose one  she was very helpful and nice. we will go back.

data.title: Great beer and chill place
data.text: Man, this place is wonderful. The beer is great. You can sit inside at couches or tables, or outside where there's a big fire pit. You can drive and park, or even bike. While the staple beers are great, the seasonal beers have been fantastic and worth a try! They have popcorn and ski ball; you may find kids there in afternoons and evenings. White Duck Taco is connected too, if you have a craving. Overall, a must stop in Johnson City.

data.title: Great atmosphere!
data.text: This brewery has excellent beers by even better is the outdoor patio space. Comfy chairs, couches, fire pits and more add to the ambiance and comfort.

data.title: Great beer
data.text: Friendly bartenders ,good beer choices food and inside or outside seating. They have some games to play,and after 8:00 live music.

data.title: Johnson City's Beautiful Brewery
data.text: This brewery was an old train depot, then a tire store, and reclaimed as a beautiful building housing a great brewery, tasting room, and restaurant, White Duck Taco.  The beer has taken it's place among the best and the brewery has helped rebuild vibrancy in the downtown.  The people who work here are proud to do so because it is just a classy, friendly place to be!

data.title: Great Scottish stout ake
data.text: This place has a great vibe to it!! They give generous samples so you can really enjoy their beers! The taco place next door serves artisan tacos which are wonderful. Seating is indoor or outside. Make sure you bring your id as they ask everyone. Make this a sure stop on your visit!!

data.title: Good Brews and Big Screens for Watching Football
data.text:
I ate my tacos from the White Duck next door and enjoyed a flight of brews as well as another glass of the Munich Dunkel.  I sat at the bar, watched some college football and talked off on and on with the very attentive bartenders.  Unfortunately they were out of the seasonal Oktoberfest that night, which was a pretty popular request all evening.  I tried a flight to start - 3 eight-ounce glasses - the Pilsner, the Koelsch and the Berliner Weisse flavored with blackberry.  All were unique in taste with rather bitter finishes, too bitter for my liking.  I ordered another Dunkel and watched some football.

The bar has plenty of seating both indoors and out, with large common tables as well as several couches and large TV's.

I would definitely return and try another three beers off their extensive selection of nine different beers.

data.title: Great for locals and visitors, alike!
data.text:
My family and I are big fans of Yee-Haw Brewing ever since they opened up and got connected with the big racetrack across town. We make a plan to stop every time we are in town for the races - twice a year. That never seems like enough, but thankfully we can purchase six packs to take back home.

They have their four standard brews and several rotating brews based on the season. The staff is very friendly and always willing to answer questions about the beer if you are having trouble making a decision. Then again, if your can't make a decision there is always the four beer flight option!

The building is very well done in a rustic style. Plenty of seating indoor and out, as well as lots of fire pit action for those cold visits.

Gotta love the complimentary popcorn to snack on while consuming the devil juice. They have also recently started a late night bar food appetizer menu.

Great beer, YEEHAW!!!!

data.title: Nice place
data.text: A very nice place to go to kill some time, drink and listen to some music. The beers are great and we really enjoyed or time here! Would definitely come back! Highly recommend coming here!!

data.title: Great Food and Beer
data.text: Went to White Duck Taco and found that the brewery was attached. Did a flight of beers with my lunch and it was excellent. A good variety of beer for all tastes. Well worth it.

data.title: Great Beer
data.text: Visited when it first opened.  Love the dark beers.  They only had four beers to choose from at first but I believe they have more now.  Need to go back

data.title: Good food nice place
data.text: Food was good. I would have liked a bit more selection of sides. Prices were a tad high but over all liked the place. I would visit again

data.title: Very good rating for atmosphere
data.text:
We visit YeeHaw Brewing often.  Thankfully it's added so much to fledgling downtown JC.  And although we are frequent visitors, the beer is just okay.   For some reason I keep drinking it though!  
The atmosphere and service are great.  Oftentimes there is early music, too!  White Duck Taco is a nice addition and the food is really good.  Definitely glad they came to JC!
YeeHaw is worth a visit.  Cool t-shirts, too.

data.title: Good Staff. Beers are plain
data.text: The staff is very nice and does a great job.  The beers are just OK.  Not bad, but not special in my opinion. They're targeting the masses and thus i think the beers are plain such that no one will dislike them.  That said the 80 is the better of the four mainstays they have.  If they start getting more creative with the seasonal brews i'll come back and give them a try.
